By Apocalypse on Monday, December 5, 2005 - 11:38 am:

I thought they took a turn for the better in MR4 with the ability
to raise more than 1 monster at a time. The dungeons may have
gotten a bit redundant after the 6 millionth time you had to go
to one, but that can be improved as they continue making new
games. If MR5 adds new features while fixing some of the
problems of MR4 I am sure it will be a success.
